name: Argomon_(Champion)
description: Argomon (Champion) is a purple spherical Digimon with four eyespots , in reference to Argus Panoptes , around a radial mouth that resembles four flower petals and three pairs of eyes resembling those of a snail infected with Leucochloridium paradoxum on top of its head. Its tendrils and tongue resemble cables and it has a pair of arms composed of vines ending in industrial manipulators .
